name: customer-feedback-analyzer-web
description: Customer AI Driven Feedback Analyzer - Frontend & BFF

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cp -r client/dist dist/client-build && npm run validate-build
scripts.build:render: npm ci --production=false && cd client && npm ci --production=false && npm run build && cd .. && npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && (cp -r client/dist dist/client-build 2>/dev/null || xcopy /E /I /Y client\dist dist\client-build) && npm run validate-build
